        public int randomNumberBetweenTwoIntegers(int least,

      • Attack

        public boolean Attack(int numberOfArmiesOfAttacker,
                      int numberOfArmiesOfDefender)
        This method will simulate the attack when player attacks an adjacent country.
        Parameters:
        numberOfArmiesOfAttacker - Number of armies that are inside attacker's country.
        numberOfArmiesOfDefender - Number of armies that are inside defender's country.
        Returns:
        resultOfAttack Result of the process.
